metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3982 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Distributions using CAP_SYS_NICE in gnome-shell may be exposed to privilege escalation

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Red Hat's gnome-shell packaging was setting CAP_SYS_NICE on the gnome-shell binary. Ubuntu packaging does not do that, so is not vulnerable to this issue.

criterions.comment: gnome-shell package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.38.4-1ubuntu3~21.04.1').
